sally.name: Sally
sally.description: Sally's a bit silly, but that's what makes her unique!

rick.name: Rick
rick.description: A rock that slides, support your team with it's rocky shine.

pod.name: Pod
pod.description: Don't underestimate him due to his size, he packs a hefty punch!

buzz honey.name: Buzz Honey
buzz honey.description: Honey here, honey there, Buzz spreads joy everywhere!

beji woof.name: Beji Woof
beji woof.description: Beji is a loyal fellow, trust him to support your team!

fiesta mista.name: Fiesta Mista
fiesta mista.description: You're on fire, they're on fire, even Fiesta's on fire?!

tough guy gilbert.name: Tough Guy Gilbert
tough guy gilbert.description: Rock... no IRON hard body, good luck getting through that armor!
